transArray.content: The location of this hotel is excellent, about 100 meters away from the exit of Metro Line 7, and also near the Qianmen Exit of Metro Line 2. The hotel waiters are very enthusiastic, considerate in service, and responsible for the epidemic prevention work. No extra bed is allowed in the room, the design is very user-friendly and intelligent, for example: call when you open the door, smart electric curtains... The breakfast is very goodüëç, nutritious breakfast! High cost performance! There is no parking lot.
